content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
────────────────────
### Central Production Hub at position(0.5, 0.5)
Consists of:
- Wooden chest at position(0.5, 0.5) serving as the central resource storage.
- Stone furnace at position(1.0, -1.0) smelting iron ore into iron plates; status: NO_FUEL; warnings: [“out of fuel”]; furnace_source holding 48 units of iron ore.
- Stone furnace at position(3.0, 1.0) smelting copper ore into copper plates; status: NO_INGREDIENTS; warnings: [“no ingredients to smelt”]; fuel inventory includes coal (2 units) and furnace_result contains 6 copper plates (with the source now empty).

### Research Lab at position(6.5, 6.5)
Consists of:
- Lab at position(6.5, 6.5) configured with 10 automation science packs for research; status: NO_POWER; electrical_id updated to 3720.
- ElectricityGroup with id=3720 connecting small electric poles at positions (9.5, 6.5), (10.5, 7.5) and (8.5, 6.5).

### Steam-Powered Electricity Generator at position(2.5, 21.5)
Consists of:
- Steam Engine at position(2.5, 21.5) for electricity generation; status: NOT_CONNECTED; warnings: [“not connected to power network”, “no input liquid”, “no fluid present in connections”]; connection points at (5.0, 21.5) and (0.0, 21.5).
- Boiler at position(-6.0, 24.5) for steam production; status: NO_FUEL; warnings: [“out of fuel”]; fluid_box holds approximately 200 units of water at 15°; connection points at (-5.5, 22.5) and (-5.5, 26.5); now associated with fluid_system [12492].
- Offshore Pump at position(-9.5, 24.5) for water extraction; status: WORKING; fluid_box contains 100 units of water at 15°; now associated with fluid_system [12492].
- Pipeline Network comprising:
  • PipeGroup with fluid_system=12492 at position(-6.5, 20.5); status: WORKING.
  • PipeGroup with fluid_system=12493 at position(-2.5, 20.5); status: EMPTY.
  • PipeGroup with fluid_system=12494 at position(-0.5, 21.5); status: EMPTY.
  • PipeGroup with fluid_system=12499 at position(-3.5, 23.5); status: EMPTY.
  • PipeGroup with fluid_system=12498 at position(-7.5, 25.5); status: EMPTY.
  • PipeGroup with fluid_system=12503 at position(3.5, 25.5); status: EMPTY.
  • PipeGroup with fluid_system=12502 at position(2.5, 24.5); status: EMPTY.
  • PipeGroup with fluid_system=12505 at position(-0.5, 28.5); status: EMPTY.

ERROR TIPS
────────────────────
• Repeated Fluid System Connection Failures and Incorrect Fluid System IDs:
  - Multiple connection attempts using varying fluid_system IDs (earlier attempts with 11804, 11847, 11890, etc., and recent attempts with 12148, 12191, 12234, 12277, 12320, 12363, 12406, and 12449) have all resulted in no working PipeGroup being found. Validate the active pipeline network configuration and confirm the correct, available fluid_system before initiating a connection.

• Redundant Stabilization Delays:
  - The fixed 10-second wait period imposed after each failed attempt is causing unnecessary delays. Use real-time connection viability checks to minimize idle waiting.

• Unresolved Water Supply Integration:
  - With the steam engine persistently reporting “no input liquid” despite repeated connection attempts, reexamine and correct the alignment and connectivity between the offshore pump, boiler, and pipeline network to ensure proper water delivery.
